text: Boris Godunov () is a 1954 Soviet drama movie directed by Vera Stroyeva.БОРИС ГОДУНОВ (1954) It stars Alexander Pirogov, Nikandr Khanayev, and Georgii Nelepp. The movie is based on the 1874 opera of the same name by Modest Mussorgsky and the 1825 play by Alexander Pushkin. ==Actors== * Alexander Pirogov as Boris Godunov * Nikandr Khanayev as Vasili Shuysky * Georgii Nelepp as Grigori * Maxim Mikhailov as Pimen, a monk * Ivan Kozlovsky as The Fool * Aleksej Krivchenya as Varlaam == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vera Stroyeva
title: Boris Godunov (1954 movie)
